mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (n_title, n_regdate, n_read_count, n_context, n_img) VALUES(#{nTitle}, now(), 0, #{nContext}, #{nImg})
mapper.select: SELECT n_no, n_title, n_regdate, n_read_count, n_context, n_img FROM notice ORDER BY n_no desc, n_regdate desc
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET n_read_count = n_read_count + 1 WHERE n_no = #{nNo}
